Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

Resonator Filter

Discussion

This filter provides a resonant filter that allows frequencies around the center to pass. The advantage of this filter is that you can "slide" the center and achieve some interesting effects.

Preferences:

"Resonator Center": Center Frequency. Range: 20.0 to 20000.0 Hz.

"Resonator Width": Width of Frequency. Range: 20.0 to 20000.0. Hz.


Group: Digital Filter Services
Related Sections: Band-Pass Filter, High-Pass Filter, Low-Pass Filter
